channel.title: Bring Back MoparScape3.0
channel.description:
Well I think that this "Mopar" character should leave MoparScape3.0 so it can still be used. You cannot even log into a private server on MoparScape3.1 as all it says is "Your Account is already logged in. Try again now or make another name." So I try again, same message. Then I make another account, guess what? Same ****in name!!!
I am sure that there are other MoparScape users that have the same problem. I have not modified any files at all.
On the console, it says that the file: shops.cfg cannot be found even though it is there.
Can somebody actually help or get MoparScape3.0 running again as that is user friendly and 3.1 is complete bullshit!

item.title: Bring Back MoparScape3.0

item.description:
@stevenofowners wrote:

i would like to know aswell becouse when i m downloading it it camoes out 3.2 and it even does not work :mad: :mad:
